snippet.title: Star Wars Pinball: Star Wars Rebels Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the crew of the starship Ghost as they embark on adventures across the galaxy in Star Wars Pinball: Star Wars Rebels! The latest Star Wars Pinball table from Zen Studios combines the great characters of the hit Star Wars Rebels TV show, including Kanan Jarrus, Ezra Bridger, Zeb Orrelios, Sabine Wren, Hera Syndulla and Chopper, with Zen's exciting pinball action for an unrivaled experience in a galaxy far, far away.

Release dates by platform: 
Zen Pinball 2 and Star Wars Pinball on PSN: Available in North America on Tuesday April 28th and Europe on Wednesday April 29th
Pinball FX2 for Steam & Xbox 360: Available Wednesday April 29th
Pinball FX2 for Xbox One:  Available Thursday April 30th
Zen Pinball and Star Wars Pinball for iOS: Available Thursday April 30th
Zen Pinball HD and Star Wars Pinball for Android & Amazon: Available Thursday April 30th
Star Wars Pinball for Wii U: Thursday April 30th 

For more information, visit the Zen Studios blog: http://blog.zenstudios.com/?p=5141
